title: Mordekaiser Jungle 6.22
body: Has anyone played Mordekaiser Jungle in the PBE? I can't find any footage or discussion on it. I just wanted to know how the smite and camp changes effected his clear speed and sustain. The closest example I got so far was watching a Zack run but it looked like a pretty slow clear.

replies.body: Stonewall008 probably covered him in his season 7 jungle clears and predictions videos.

> [{quoted}](name=FlamingEnemy13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=K8NmBzMY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-08T04:33:12.013+0000)
>
> Stonewall008 probably covered him in his season 7 jungle clears and predictions videos.

Thanks a lot. It was under the remaining clears video. The clear still looks extremely fast. I think I'll still be able to keep my move speed quints while also using the more duel oriented talents. Will have to do a few runs when it comes out in tomorrow, but that was a good first look.
He can farm fine, but his ganks are worthless.
I'm sure he's slow but at full health
